entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
